segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to identify the report/voyage number, type of message (e.g. amendment) and date/time of message of creation.
DTM, A segment to indicate date/time of conveyance report to Customs.
QTY, A segment to identify the number of passengers, number of crew, number of bills.
POC, A segment to indicate the purpose of call of the conveyance.
FTX, A segment to provide observations, remarks and reason for change.
MEA, A segment to specify the conveyance's gross tonnage, net tonnage, summer dead weight tonnage, containerized/non- containerized tonnage and overall length.
GEI, A segment to specify the import/export/transit indicator, prohibited/restricted goods indicator and unregistered spaces indicator.
GPO, A segment used to identify the geographical position of the conveyance at the time of reporting.
STS, A segment to specify the security status relating to the conveyance at the time of reporting.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify references and dates/times related to the conveyance.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers associated with the conveyance.
DTM, A segment to specify dates/times associated with the conveyance's reference numbers.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying a general description of cargo aboard the conveyance.

segment.documentation: GDS, A segment identifying the nature of cargo in coded format or text, e.g. To indicate where the cargo is hazardous.
FTX, A segment identifying the details of the cargo in narrative form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify voyage itinerary.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the conveyance's voyage itinerary - ports of call/places.
DTM, A segment to specify dates/time associated with the itinerary.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify supporting documentary requirements and associated reference numbers, dates/times and locations.

segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to specify supporting documentary requirements, including Certificate of Registry, Safety of Life at Sea Certificate, Maritime Health Declaration, Ship's Stores Declaration (FAL 3), Crew's Effects Declaration (FAL 4), Crew's List Declaration (FAL 5), Passenger List (FAL 6).
RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers associated with a supporting documentary requirement.
DTM, A segment to specify dates/times/periods associated with a supporting documentary requirement.
LOC, A segment to specify locations associated with a supporting documentary requirement.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to indicate duty/tax/fee details and monetary amounts payable related to the conveyance.

segment.documentation: TAX, A segment to specify relevant duty/tax/fee information.
MOA, A segment to specify monetary amount.
FII, A segment to identify an account and a related financial institution relevant to the payment of duty/tax/fee.
LOC, A segment to identify a place relevant to the payment of duty/tax/fee.
RFF, A segment to identify a reference number relevant to the payment of duty/tax/fee.
DTM, A segment to identify dates, times or periods relevant to the payment of duty/tax/fee.
GEI, A segment to transmit a processing indicator.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to identify names, addresses, contacts and references relating to the message.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify declarant's name and address, ship's agent name and address, and master's name.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments specifying persons/departments and communication numbers associated with the party identified in

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify the person or department to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment to identify communication numbers (i.e. telephone/ fax numbers) of departments or persons to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments specifying reference or transaction numbers and dates associated with the party identified in NAD, group 5.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify numbers associated with the named party or transaction.
DTM, A segment to specify dates/times associated with references.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to indicate details related to each leg of transport.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to specify details of transport related to each leg, including name/number of vessel/vehicle/flight, nationality of ship, conveyance reference number, type of service identifier and carrier.
TPL, A segment to specify placement of goods or equipment in relation to the transport used.
DTM, A segment to specify associated dates/times as required related to details of transport.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify locations related to each leg of transport, each ship to ship activity, or for any special security incident, the security status of operation of the means of transport associated dates/times and quantity (tonnage) of cargo loaded/unloaded and associated details at each port.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify port of initial arrival, place/station of last foreign port of call (last departure), place/port of loading, place/port of discharge, quay location/position of ship in port.
GPO, A segment specifying the Latitude and Longitude of each ship to ship activity or any security incident.
DTM, A segment to specify associated dates/times as required related to locations.
QTY, A segment to specify tonnage of cargo loaded/unloaded at each port.
NAD, A segment to specify names and addresses of agents and partner companies of joint operation at each place and/or port.
MEA, A segment to specify the forward draft and the after draft of the vessel at each port.
POC, A segment to specify purpose of call at each place and/or port.
STS, A segment to specify the status relating to the conveyance at each place/port (e.g. loaded, security level maintained, security plans adhered, additional security measure taken etc.).
FTX, A segment to specify additional information (e.g. Customs clearance of personal effects and/or consigned articles) at each place and/or port.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to identify equipment details and number of equipment units.

segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify the size of containers and whether empty/loaded.
EQN, A segment to identify number of containers.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to specify results and date/time of the application of an authentication procedure.

segment.documentation: AUT, A segment to specify results of the application of an authentication procedure.
DTM, A segment to specify associated dates/times as required related to an authentication procedure.
